short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click import of Strava and SwitzerlandMobility routes to Homebytwo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Homebytwo is a website that lets you schedule outdoor activities based on your Strava history. The Homebytwo importer add-on displays a button in your navigation bar when browsing a route than can be saved in homebytwo.ch.
